---
title: "Bnlearn functions dependency graph"
runtime: shiny
output: html_document
---
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Install required **devtools** package to install dependencies form GitHub.

```{r}
  if (!require("devtools")) {
    install.packages("devtools")
  }
  library("devtools")
```

Install **DependenciesGraphs** form GitHub.

```{r}
  if (!require("DependenciesGraphs")) {
      devtools::install_github("DataKnowledge/DependenciesGraphs")
    }
  library("DependenciesGraphs")
```

Create the dependency graph for Bnlearn.

```{r}
  if (!require("bnlearn")) {
      devtools::install_github("AlessioZanga/bnlearn")
  }
  library("bnlearn")
  dep <- envirDependencies("package:bnlearn")
  plot(dep)
```
